Chemical.content:
Please identify the "Chemical" entities in the following paragraph. Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Chemical". Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

Paragraph: Preoperative and postoperative assessments of these patients at 1 , 3 , 6 and 12 months follow - up , in " on " and " off " drug conditions , was carried out using Unified Parkinson ' s Disease Rating Scale , Hoehn and Yahr staging , England activities of daily living score and video recordings .

Let's think step by step.

| Chemical |
| --- |
| Unified Parkinson's Disease Rating Scale |

The Unified Parkinson's Disease Rating Scale (UPDRS) is not a chemical per se, but it is a standardized assessment tool used to measure the severity of motor and non-motor symptoms of Parkinson's disease. It does not contain any specific chemical entities.
